data.text: @JCsFluffyTail 😷 With my first shot, my arm was slightly sore and I was tired for a few hours. I wondered if the next day I would have a slight fever and have to quarantine from work for 14 days. Would have been ironic to have to quarantine from work for having a Covid shot.
@RadjintheDragon Last time got sick n missed work
@JCsFluffyTail On the second shot, just a slight sore arm like all shots, no symptoms at all.
